channel.title: Hello pleasse help with this!
channel.description: I'm trying to connect other people to my server, my fiancé is also able to connect to my server no problem but for some reason anybody else has to have jre8 downloaded, im not sure if this is a new thing or...if ive done something wrong or maybe I have to do something for them to run the client. please help!

item.title: Hello pleasse help with this!
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:6, topic:545883”][quote author=tank nation link=topic=664767.msg4443993#msg4443993 date=1407891873]

Wait, what’s wrong?

Okay look, i went with another server. Problem with this is im trying to find out how to make a autocache download so it goes straight into the C: drive so people don’t have to take the cache and place it there to play it. I need it to automatically go there, How can i do this?
[/quote]

Most clients already have a cache downloader implemented. You just need to change the download link, and the cache location in your signlink class[/quote]

okay ill show you mine and tell em what i need to change, i think i know what ur talking about but not fully understanding. this will be my signlink.java file. Also stupid enough the person who made the client or whatever decided to put 2 caches in the client folder first one has the second cache with all the files… so dumb

Read full topic

item.title: Hello pleasse help with this!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“tank nation, post:5, topic:545883”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=664767.msg4443916#msg4443916 date=1407877384]
Wait, what’s wrong?
[/quote]

Okay look, i went with another server. Problem with this is im trying to find out how to make a autocache download so it goes straight into the C: drive so people don’t have to take the cache and place it there to play it. I need it to automatically go there, How can i do this?[/quote]

Most clients already have a cache downloader implemented. You just need to change the download link, and the cache location in your signlink class

Read full topic

item.title: Hello pleasse help with this!
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

Wait, what’s wrong?

Okay look, i went with another server. Problem with this is im trying to find out how to make a autocache download so it goes straight into the C: drive so people don’t have to take the cache and place it there to play it. I need it to automatically go there, How can i do this?

Read full topic

item.title: Hello pleasse help with this!
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:2, topic:545883”]I think you’re fiance is able to connect since she’s using the same internet as you?
Make sure your server is connecting to your IPv4 (I think?) and so is the client. Or connecting to your no-ip, if you use one.

Or, it could be a portforwarding issue, make sure you’ve portforwarded correctly ;D[/quote]

Thank you, But yes everything is correct and done right. After he had downloaded jre8 he was able to run the server. The problem is that he coudn’t load up the client at all… cause for some reason it needed jre8 to open the client its self… strange id say. Also when u connect someone to you’re server it would be your ip but in this case (mine). can u do some searches and maybe help me figure this one out?

Read full topic

item.title: Hello pleasse help with this!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I think you’re fiance is able to connect since she’s using the same internet as you?
Make sure your server is connecting to your IPv4 (I think?) and so is the client. Or connecting to your no-ip, if you use one.

Or, it could be a portforwarding issue, make sure you’ve portforwarded correctly ;D

Read full topic
